Class LeantegraCmsClient

  • java.lang.Object

    1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • getEventInfo

        public retrofit2.Call<EventInfo> getEventInfo(java.util.UUID uuid,
                                     int major,
                                     int minor,
                                     ProximityZone proximityZone,
                                     retrofit2.Callback<EventInfo> callback)
        Asynchronously send the event info request and notify callback.

        Note: If response code is 404 or 500, you can parse error message using ErrorUtils.parseError(retrofit2.Response<?>).

        For example: 

        {@code
  LeantegraCmsClient client = new LeantegraCmsClient();
  ...
  client.getEventInfo(uuid, major, minor, ProximityZone.NEAR, new Callback() {
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID
        major - The major ID
        minor - The minor ID
        proximityZone - The proximity event zone
        callback - Response callback
        Returns:
        Call<EventInfo> object through which you can cancel request or get status

                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Parameters:

        callback - Response callback
        Returns:
